name: PressTris
description:
PressTris is a platformer with an Arcade feeling, staring the infamous tetrominoes. Dodge them, climb them to reach the exit at every level to increase your score.

PS : Wall jumping is not an option, it's a necessity !

All assets were made by me except for the sound that comes from the Create With Code course pack on unity learn  https://learn.unity.com/course/create-with-code and the font comes from https://www.1001fonts.com/manaspace-font.html

Shoutout to Matow, Chuw and Pum for helping with playtesting.

Download, extract the archive and start the game with PressTris.exe
